channel.title: Help with this?
channel.description:
Ok so, I downloaded the java file, I extracted the files. Downloaded the client from theasseffect.com or whatever. And extracted THOSE files. So i run mopar, everything is working fine, Im on the login screen:
Username: 000000 Pass: Blank IP: 0.0.0.0
I hit connect, it says "Error connecting to server." After about 3 seconds. Im an [b]UBER NOOB[/b] when it comes to this kind of stuff, help please?

item.title: Help with this?
item.dc:creator: @Riley Riley
item.description:
@Riley wrote:

Are you trying to create a server? If so go to the tutorials at the bottom of the fourms. Or if you have hamachi go to “Rs2 server advertisment” at the bottom of the fourms and just join one of there servers. It would be better if there server is 24\7 so you don’t have to keep going back and fourth.

Read full topic
